text: San Marino competed at the 2015 European Games, in Baku, Azerbaijan from 12 to 28 June 2015.Baku 2015 Participants It was announced that San Marino would be entering 18 athletes, to compete in the games. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !
